name: Super CosmoJet
description:
Super CosmoJet is a 2D physics-based action space game. Pilot your ship through 8 hazardous star systems on your career as a commercial space captain.

How do you want to earn a living? Transport passengers, deliver cargo with your tractor beam, mine asteroids for gold or destroy enemies for bounty payments. Spend your hard-earned cash on ship upgrades and weapons, and save up enough to buy your way to the next system through hyperspace jump gates.

  • Master flying three different unlockable ships
  • Physics-based gameplay: Land on planets with different gravitational fields, and avoid black holes and other environmental hazards like asteroids
  • Every star system is procedurally generated at runtime, so no two play-throughs are the same
  • Steam Achievements
  • Mouse/keyboard and gamepad support
